meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.0 has just been released. It comes with a set of new exciting features!

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.8 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.8 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0.CR2 released!
meta.summary: The second candidate release of the upcoming Vert.x 4.1 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Getting started with new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin
meta.summary: The all new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin allows you to setup, package, run, start, stop and redeploy easily with a very little configuration resulting in a less verbose pom.xml.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.7.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that the Eclipse Vert.x version 3.7.0 has been released.

meta.title: Checklist for Migrating from Vert.x 2.1.x to Vert.x 3 - Part One
meta.summary: So while upgrading our application, I thought I should note down all the changes that we had to do in the process. Since Vert.x 3 is a major upgrade from the previous version, with so many changes.
